words.prompt: People have an ____________ for the things they value.
If he ____________ the answer, he said it suddenly.
When you say something nice about someone, you are ____________ that person.
____________ means to give praise or good wishes for something that has happened.
The baker's story ____________ , or disagreed with, the butcher's story.
A person who is ____________ will find fault with something or someone.
When you research your family's ____________ past, you learn about your family customs, beliefs, and traditions.
When friends have a ____________ , they fail to understand one another.
____________ describes a thing not made by nature.
When we ____________ , we work together.
If the driver ____________ his time to volunteer, he gave or devoted his time.
Something ____________ is able to bend without breaking.
To use a tool, you should understand its ____________ , or its purpose.
When you ____________ something, you imitate it.
An ____________ stands in the way or blocks progress.
____________ are special ways of doing something to achieve a desired result.
An ____________ is a person who digs up and studies remains of ancient towns and cities.
An ____________ is a period of time or history.
____________s are small, broken pieces.
A ____________ is a person who knows a great deal about history.
Something that is ____________ is whole or complete.
Something that is ____________ is protected so that it does not decay or get damaged.
When you ____________ something, you put its parts back together.
____________ are small pieces or parts of something that are left over.
